prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered cosmic dancing pose within geometric mandala circle, chibi proportions with large translucent wave dimensional head with unique vesica_piscis structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying dimensional. Hair or geometric appendages incorporating vesica_piscis, merkaba_spiral patterns, styled with Dominion commands influences. Outfit is unique: neutral grey and neutral grey fluid draped garments with wave geometric patterns with flat with sharpie-style lines for flow and depth, elaborate with shifting Water element curved motifs and descending patterns and vesica_piscis emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like lunar crescent with silver geometric inscriptions with dimensional spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like rippling water wisps and droplet particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor MOLPAND's profile: 'He who recieves men', Aethyr ICH, Water element, Tarot The World, Sephirot Yesod, Zodiac Aquarius, embodying the essence: 'In MOLPAND's presence, a tranquil harbor opens for the soul a port where journeyman spirits first taste the calm of incarnation.' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.pose: front-facing centered cosmic dancing pose within geometric mandala circle
visual_elements.head_shape: large translucent wave dimensional head with unique vesica_piscis structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with translucent facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying dimensional
visual_elements.hair_style: geometric appendages incorporating vesica_piscis, merkaba_spiral patterns, styled with Dominion commands influences

outfit.base: fluid draped garments with wave geometric patterns
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for flow and depth
outfit.details: Water element curved motifs and descending patterns
outfit.magical_essence: rippling water wisps and droplet particles

visual_elements.accessory: lunar crescent with silver geometric inscriptions
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He who recieves men'
profile_data.essence: In MOLPAND's presence, a tranquil harbor opens for the soul a port where journeyman spirits first taste the calm of incarnation.
profile_data.angelic_role: Dominion of the Harbor of Incarnation; commands oceanic mariners.
profile_data.form_description: A translucent, wave-like form that shifts between liquid crystal and oceanic membrane, representing the liminal space between incarnation and spiritual emergence
profile_data.color_reasoning: Aquamarine represents Water element's fluidity and Yesod's mystical transition; pearl white symbolizes spiritual purity and the harbor of incarnation
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Sacred geometries representing divine birth, dimensional transition, and spiritual emergence
